products.title: Shirt
products.description: Brown solid opaque Casual shirt ,has a spread collar, button placket, 1 patch pocket, long regular sleeves, curved hem.60% Polyester 40% Cotton, Machine wash

products.title: Patterned Saree
products.description: Wrap yourself in elegance with our damson purple jaal patterned saree, beautifully adorned with intricate borders that highlight its luxurious design. The rich purple hue adds a touch of regal sophistication, making it perfect for weddings and festive celebrations.

products.title: Casual Shoes
products.description: Black solid casual shoes, has a round toe, lace-up detail, cushioned footbed, textured outsole with patterned grooves. PU (polyurethane), Wipe with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust.

products.title: Formal Shoes
products.description: Brown solid formal shoes, has a round toe, lace-up detail, cushioned footbed, textured outsole with patterned grooves. PU (polyurethane), Wipe with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust.
